ComicInfo.Title: Look Out; Chiller!; Ya Can't Win 'Em All; Space Girl
ComicInfo.Summary:
Penny gives Hopey a haircut.
Ray's apartment has been burgled, which puts him in a foul mood and makes him reflect on his own teen-age misdemeanour.
Child discovers the mystery of Channel 1 whilst tuning his television.
Driving back alone from Penny's place, Maggie follows Penny's advice to take the "Horror Highway" 696. She freaks herself out thinking about all the things that could possibly go wrong, and ends up breaking down in the middle of nowhere.
Negra and Norma are lounging by the pool when Norma's sometime boyfriend Bolani lets himself in. Negra goes to her room to dress a cut and later spies Norma and the creepy Bolani making love. It's implied Bolani has improper thoughts towards Negra.
Isabel is supposed to give a reading from her new book, but can't leave her house because she has grown so big. She ends up giving the reading at home, and outs Hopey as the starter of the Ray's Liquor Store blaze.
Space Girl moans about her day to an alien bar-tender.
